column4: hi, total newbie. just downloaded the latest release of ubuntu and running off of the live cd. Before installing on my hard drive, i want to make sure my multiple monitor (3) setup will work with ubuntu. Right now only one monitor is active. How do I get the others to come on?
in windows, the monitors work as three seperate displays rather than one large display. will this be possible in ubuntu?
its easy... if you have nvidia
